name: HodgePodge (FeeFieFoFishy)
description:
This is a short game puzzle-ish game where you play different minigames. 

It was made in a week for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

KNOWN BUGS
_________________

  1. Sometimes when loading into a level the game freezes to fix click escape to pause the game then click resume to  continue playing and the bug should be fixed.
  2. The character at the end of the game sometimes rotates infinity, to fix this back away from him and then go back to him. This should fix it.

If you find another bugs please report them in the comments.

__________________________________________________________________

*Disclaimer this game is probably going to be pretty bad because its only my second game I have ever fully finished. Well that's about it so have fun!
